title: Singed Mains in Agony
body: Riot you are leaving us singed mains in agony when you release Arclight Yorick but Beekeeper Singed is still left unreleased. Is beekeeper singed going to be released anytime in the near future?

replies.body: Skins usually come out on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 2PM EST. So Thursday is my best bet for the Singed skin.
Looks like he's only hit the PBE for the time being, but if you check the store and news page periodically you'll be the first to know when he goes live.
What a joke of an answer
